participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: Introverted and hardworking, George enjoys spending time in nature and has a passion for his bee farm.
participant_1.background: i have zero family that i'm close to. my name is george. my favorite food is papaya. i am a bee farmer.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and friendly, Emily loves to engage in sports and values her family life.
participant_2.background: i am married to a doctor. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i am a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house. my family is continuously growing.
